<main id="main-content" class="">
    <article>
        <div class="page-wrapper PostDetail_wrapper__ea9fY">
            <div class="PostDetail_post-heading__LeDFA">
                <div class="PostDetail_post-detail-types-subjects__rYglE">
                    <span class="PostDetail_post-subject__Kpz7U PostDetail_disabled__zFGBd PostDetail_chip__oT3gx detail-s">Announcements</span>
                </div>
                <h1 class="h2">Claude for Life Sciences</h1>
                <div class="PostDetail_post-timestamp__TBJ0Z text-label">Oct 20, 2025<span class="PostDetail_is-bullet__eYdNk">●</span>4 min<!-- --> read</div>
            </div>
            <div class="text-b2 PostDetail_post-detail__6Ldh_">
                <div class="PostDetail_post-hero__SZjfq">
                    <div class="PostDetail_illustration-wrapper__ByK8G bg-clay">
                        <img fetchPriority="high" width="1000" height="1000" decoding="async" data-nimg="1" style="color:transparent" src="https://www-cdn.anthropic.com/images/4zrzovbb/website/74409af25137110ac04cc39e4d5ea0a2fbcea421-1000x1000.svg" alt="Illustration showing a hand with a branching, tree-like network structure extending from its fingertips."/>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="page-wrapper">
            <article>
                <div class="">
                    <div class="Body_body__XEXq7">
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">Increasing the rate of scientific progress is a core part of Anthropic’s public benefit mission.</p>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">We are focused on building the tools to allow researchers to make new discoveries – and eventually, to allow AI models to make these discoveries autonomously.</p>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">Until recently, scientists typically used Claude for individual tasks, like writing code for statistical analysis or summarizing papers. Pharmaceutical companies and others in industry also use it for tasks across the rest of their business, like sales, to fund new research. Now, our goal is to make Claude capable of supporting the entire process, from early discovery through to translation and commercialization.</p>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">To do this, we’re rolling out <a href="https://www.claude.com/solutions/life-sciences" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">several improvements</a> that aim to make Claude a better partner for those who work in the life sciences, including researchers, clinical coordinators, and regulatory affairs managers. </p>
                        <h2 class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM display-sans-m post-heading" id="making-claude-a-better-research-partner">Making Claude a better research partner</h2>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">First, we’ve improved Claude’s underlying performance. Our most capable model, Claude Sonnet 4.5, is significantly better than previous models at a range of life sciences tasks. For example, on Protocol QA, a benchmark that tests the model’s understanding and facility with laboratory protocols, Sonnet 4.5 scores 0.83, against a human baseline of 0.79, and Sonnet 4’s performance of 0.74.<sup class="detail-s agate">1</sup> Sonnet 4.5 shows a similar improvement on its predecessor on BixBench, an evaluation that measures its performance on bioinformatics tasks.</p>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">To make Claude more useful for scientific work, we’re now adding several <a href="https://claude.com/partners/mcp" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">new connectors</a> to scientific platforms, the ability to use Agent Skills, and life sciences-specific support in the form of a prompt library and dedicated support.</p>
                        <h2 class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM display-sans-m post-heading" id="connecting-claude-to-scientific-tools">Connecting Claude to scientific tools</h2>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text"><a href="https://claude.ai/settings/connectors" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><strong>Connectors</strong></a> allow Claude to access other platforms and tools directly. We’re adding several new connectors that are designed to make it easier to use Claude for scientific discovery:</p>
                        <ul class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">
                            <li><strong>Benchling </strong>gives Claude the ability to respond to scientists’ questions with links back to source experiments, notebooks, and records;</li>
                            <li><strong>BioRender</strong> connects Claude to its extensive library of vetted scientific figures, icons, and templates;</li>
                            <li><strong>PubMed</strong> provides access to millions of biomedical research articles and clinical studies;</li>
                            <li><strong>Scholar Gateway developed by Wiley</strong> provides<strong> </strong>access to authoritative, peer-reviewed scientific content within Claude to accelerate research discovery;</li>
                            <li><strong>Synapse.org </strong>allows scientists to share and analyze data together in public or private projects;</li>
                            <li><strong>10x Genomics</strong> allows researchers to conduct single cell and spatial analysis in natural language.</li>
                        </ul>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">These connectors add to our existing set, which includes general purpose tools like Google Workspace and Microsoft SharePoint, OneDrive, Outlook, and Teams. Claude can also already work directly with Databricks to provide analytics for large-scale bioinformatics research, and Snowflake to search through large datasets using natural language questions.</p>
                        <h2 class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM display-sans-m post-heading" id="developing-skills-for-claude">Developing skills for Claude</h2>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">Last week, we released <a href="https://www.anthropic.com/news/skills" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Agent Skills:</a> folders including instructions, scripts, and resources that Claude can use to improve how it performs specific tasks. Skills are a natural fit for scientific work, since they allow Claude to consistently and predictably follow specific protocols and procedures.</p>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">We’re developing a number of scientific skills for Claude, beginning with <strong><code class="InlineCodeBlock_code____19F">single-cell-rna-qc</code></strong> This skill performs quality control and filtering on single-cell RNA sequencing data, using <a href="https://scverse.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">scverse</a> best practices:</p>
                        <div class="Body_media-column__xPzhg">
                            <figure class="ImageWithCaption_e-imageWithCaption__8C2mY ImageWithCaption_inline-image__B15e_">
                                <img alt="Claude performs quality control on single-cell RNA-seq data" loading="lazy" width="3840" height="2160" decoding="async" data-nimg="1" style="color:transparent" srcSet="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww-cdn.anthropic.com%2Fimages%2F4zrzovbb%2Fwebsite%2F07de700e38ef4d328ccdb5c15ab9e3df5286fc08-3840x2160.png&w=3840&q=75 1x" src="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww-cdn.anthropic.com%2Fimages%2F4zrzovbb%2Fwebsite%2F07de700e38ef4d328ccdb5c15ab9e3df5286fc08-3840x2160.png&w=3840&q=75"/>
                                <figcaption class="text-caption"><em>Claude performs quality control on single-cell RNA-seq data.</em><br/></figcaption>
                            </figure>
                        </div>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">In addition to the skills we’re creating, scientists can build their own. For more information and guidance, including setting up custom skills, see <a href="https://support.claude.com/en/articles/12512180-using-skills-in-claude" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">here</a>.</p>
                        <h2 class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM display-sans-m post-heading" id="using-claude-for-life-sciences">Using Claude for Life Sciences</h2>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">Claude can be used for life sciences tasks like the following:</p>
                        <ul class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">
                            <li><strong>Research, like literature reviews and developing hypotheses:</strong> Claude can cite and summarize biomedical literature and generate testable ideas based on what it finds.</li>
                        </ul>
                        <div class="Body_media-column__xPzhg">
                            <figure class="Video_post-wrapper__uy5Rq">
                                <div class="Video_post-video-container__oACj_">
                                    <!--$!--><template data-dgst="BAILOUT_TO_CLIENT_SIDE_RENDERING"></template><!--/$-->
                                </div>
                                <figcaption class="text-caption">Watch how Claude analyzes data, conducts a literature review, dives into potentially novel insights, turns this analysis into a presentation, and puts the finishing touches on slides with a figure from BioRender.</figcaption>
                            </figure>
                        </div>
                        <ul class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">
                            <li><strong>Generating protocols</strong>: With the Benchling connector, Claude can draft study protocols, standard operating procedures and consent documents.</li>
                            <li><strong>Bioinformatics and data analysis</strong>: Process and analyze genomic data with Claude Code. Claude can present its results in <a href="https://www.anthropic.com/news/create-files" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">slides, docs</a>, or code notebook format.</li>
                            <li><strong>Clinical and regulatory compliance</strong>: Claude can draft and review regulatory submissions, and compile compliance data.</li>
                        </ul>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">In addition, to help scientists get started quickly, we’re creating a <a href="https://support.claude.com/en/articles/12614768-getting-started-with-claude-for-life-sciences" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">library of prompts</a> that should elicit best results on tasks like the above.</p>
                        <h2 class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM display-sans-m post-heading" id="partnerships-and-customers">Partnerships and customers</h2>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">We’re providing hands-on support from dedicated subject matter experts in our Applied AI and customer-facing teams.</p>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">We’re also partnering with companies who specialize in helping organizations adopt AI for life sciences work. These include Caylent, Deloitte, Accenture, KPMG, PwC, Quantium, Slalom, Tribe AI, and Turing, along with our cloud partners, AWS and Google Cloud.</p>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">Many of our existing customers and partners have already been using Claude for a broad range of real-world scientific tasks:</p>
                        <div class="Body_media-column__xPzhg">
                            <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-carousel-wrapper__DoC4v">
                                <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-carousel-container___SH16">
                                    <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-carousel__9vusf">
                                        <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-item__jebiT QuoteCarousel_with-logo__2IRVd bg-ivory-medium">
                                            <div class="QuoteCarousel_logo-container__1IrE9">
                                                <img alt="Sanofi logo" loading="lazy" width="120" height="48" decoding="async" data-nimg="1" class="QuoteCarousel_company-logo__JZv0K" style="color:transparent" srcSet="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww-cdn.anthropic.com%2Fimages%2F4zrzovbb%2Fwebsite%2F44cb9482787368c3b6b3dc183e378abf6b5ca693-3274x1510.png&w=128&q=75 1x, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww-cdn.anthropic.com%2Fimages%2F4zrzovbb%2Fwebsite%2F44cb9482787368c3b6b3dc183e378abf6b5ca693-3274x1510.png&w=256&q=75 2x" src="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww-cdn.anthropic.com%2Fimages%2F4zrzovbb%2Fwebsite%2F44cb9482787368c3b6b3dc183e378abf6b5ca693-3274x1510.png&w=256&q=75"/>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-mark-container__jUOn5">
                                                <span class="QuoteCarousel_quote-mark__JfD6a display-serif-l">“</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <blockquote class="QuoteCarousel_quote-content__glSl8">
                                                <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-text__EX8A8 paragraph-s">Claude, paired with internal knowledge libraries, is integral to Sanofi's AI transformation and used by most Sanofians daily in our Concierge app. We're seeing efficiency gains across the value-chain, while our enterprise deployment has enhanced how teams work. This collaboration with Anthropic augments human expertise to deliver life-changing medicines faster to patients worldwide.</div>
                                                <footer class="QuoteCarousel_quote-footer__Xby2p">
                                                    <cite class="QuoteCarousel_speaker-info__I2tvs detail-xs">
                                                        <span class="QuoteCarousel_speaker-name__sNBpc">Emmanuel Frenehard</span>
                                                        <br/>
                                                        <span class="QuoteCarousel_speaker-title__swIFY">Chief Digital Officer</span>
                                                        <span class="QuoteCarousel_separator__T0hX3">, </span>
                                                        <span class="QuoteCarousel_company-name__45DOs">Sanofi</span>
                                                    </cite>
                                                </footer>
                                            </blockquote>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-item__jebiT QuoteCarousel_with-logo__2IRVd bg-ivory-medium">
                                            <div class="QuoteCarousel_logo-container__1IrE9">
                                                <img alt="Benchling logo" loading="lazy" width="120" height="48" decoding="async" data-nimg="1" class="QuoteCarousel_company-logo__JZv0K" style="color:transparent" srcSet="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww-cdn.anthropic.com%2Fimages%2F4zrzovbb%2Fwebsite%2Ff8958499b7603125dd85312cb6688fe8cf7bd959-938x321.png&w=128&q=75 1x, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww-cdn.anthropic.com%2Fimages%2F4zrzovbb%2Fwebsite%2Ff8958499b7603125dd85312cb6688fe8cf7bd959-938x321.png&w=256&q=75 2x" src="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww-cdn.anthropic.com%2Fimages%2F4zrzovbb%2Fwebsite%2Ff8958499b7603125dd85312cb6688fe8cf7bd959-938x321.png&w=256&q=75"/>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-mark-container__jUOn5">
                                                <span class="QuoteCarousel_quote-mark__JfD6a display-serif-l">“</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <blockquote class="QuoteCarousel_quote-content__glSl8">
                                                <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-text__EX8A8 paragraph-s">AI in R&D works through an ecosystem. Anthropic brings the best technologies while prioritizing access, governance, and interoperability. Benchling is uniquely positioned to contribute. For over a decade, scientists have trusted us as their source of truth for experimental data and workflows. Now we're building AI that powers the next chapter of R&D.</div>
                                                <footer class="QuoteCarousel_quote-footer__Xby2p">
                                                    <cite class="QuoteCarousel_speaker-info__I2tvs detail-xs">
                                                        <span class="QuoteCarousel_speaker-name__sNBpc">Ashu Singhal</span>
                                                        <br/>
                                                        <span class="QuoteCarousel_speaker-title__swIFY">Co-founder and President</span>
                                                        <span class="QuoteCarousel_separator__T0hX3">, </span>
                                                        <span class="QuoteCarousel_company-name__45DOs">Benchling</span>
                                                    </cite>
                                                </footer>
                                            </blockquote>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-item__jebiT QuoteCarousel_with-logo__2IRVd bg-ivory-medium">
                                            <div class="QuoteCarousel_logo-container__1IrE9">
                                                <img alt="Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard logo" loading="lazy" width="120" height="48" decoding="async" data-nimg="1" class="QuoteCarousel_company-logo__JZv0K" style="color:transparent" srcSet="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww-cdn.anthropic.com%2Fimages%2F4zrzovbb%2Fwebsite%2Fd165bbdbd303f12d2fe5e8b6d24332b5d9ab94eb-600x154.png&w=128&q=75 1x, /_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww-cdn.anthropic.com%2Fimages%2F4zrzovbb%2Fwebsite%2Fd165bbdbd303f12d2fe5e8b6d24332b5d9ab94eb-600x154.png&w=256&q=75 2x" src="/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww-cdn.anthropic.com%2Fimages%2F4zrzovbb%2Fwebsite%2Fd165bbdbd303f12d2fe5e8b6d24332b5d9ab94eb-600x154.png&w=256&q=75"/>
                                            </div>
                                            <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-mark-container__jUOn5">
                                                <span class="QuoteCarousel_quote-mark__JfD6a display-serif-l">“</span>
                                            </div>
                                            <blockquote class="QuoteCarousel_quote-content__glSl8">
                                                <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-text__EX8A8 paragraph-s">Broad Institute scientists pursue the most ambitious questions in biology and medicine, creating tools to empower scientists everywhere. We're working with Manifold on Terra Powered by Manifold. AI agents built on Claude enable scientists to work at entirely new scale and efficiency, exploring scientific domains in previously impossible ways. </div>
                                                <footer class="QuoteCarousel_quote-footer__Xby2p">
                                                    <cite class="QuoteCarousel_speaker-info__I2tvs detail-xs">
                                                        <span class="QuoteCarousel_speaker-name__sNBpc">Heather Jankins</span>
                                                        <br/>
                                                        <span class="QuoteCarousel_speaker-title__swIFY">Head of Data Science Platform</span>
                                                        <span class="QuoteCarousel_separator__T0hX3">, </span>
                                                        <span class="QuoteCarousel_company-name__45DOs">Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard</span>
                                                    </cite>
                                                </footer>
                                            </blockquote>
                                        </div>
                                        <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-item__jebiT QuoteCarousel_with-logo__2IRVd bg-ivory-medium">
                                            <div class="QuoteCarousel_logo-container__1IrE9">

This lowers the barrier for new users while scaling to meet the needs of advanced research teams.</div>

                                            <blockquote class="QuoteCarousel_quote-content__glSl8">
                                                <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-text__EX8A8 paragraph-s">Claude Code and partnership with Anthropic have been extremely valuable for developing Paper2Agent, our moonshot to transform passive research papers into interactive AI agents that can act as virtual corresponding authors and co-scientists.</div>

                                                <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-text__EX8A8 paragraph-s">At PwC, responsible AI is a trust imperative. We pair our deep sector insight with Claude's agentic intelligence to reimagine how clinical, regulatory, and commercial teams operate. Together, we're not just streamlining processes—we're elevating quality, accelerating discovery, and building systems where confidence scales alongside innovation.<br/></div>

                                                <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-text__EX8A8 paragraph-s">Claude Code has become a powerful accelerator for us at Schrödinger. For the projects where it fits best, Claude Code allows us to turn ideas into working code in minutes instead of hours, enabling us to move up to 10x faster in some cases. As we continue to work with Claude, we are excited to see how we can further transform the way we build and customize our software.</div>

                                                <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-text__EX8A8 paragraph-s">When creating an AI agent for bioinformatics analyses, we focused on three key factors: top software development, life sciences alignment, and startup support. We evaluated half a dozen platforms, and Claude was the standout leader. We're excited to continue this collaboration and bring cutting-edge AI agents into biotech research.<br/></div>

                                                <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-text__EX8A8 paragraph-s">At EvolutionaryScale, we’re building next-generation AI systems to model the living world.                                                 <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-text__EX8A8 paragraph-s">At Manifold, our mission is to power faster, leaner life sciences. Together, we’re transforming how life sciences R&D will happen in the years ahead.</div>

                                                <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-text__EX8A8 paragraph-s">At FutureHouse, Claude helps power both our bioinformatics and literature analysis workflows.                                                 <div class="QuoteCarousel_quote-text__EX8A8 paragraph-s">Claude has been invaluable for Axiom as we build AI to predict drug toxicity.                         <h2 class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM display-sans-m post-heading" id="supporting-the-life-sciences">Supporting the life sciences</h2>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">In addition to the updates described above, we’re supporting life sciences research through our <a href="https://www.anthropic.com/news/ai-for-science-program" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">AI for Science</a> program. This program provides free API credits to support leading researchers working on high-impact scientific projects around the world.</p>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">Our partnerships with these labs helps us identify new applications for Claude, while helping scientists answer some of their most pressing questions. We continue to welcome <a href="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfwDGfVg2lHJ0cc0oF_ilEnjvr_r4_paYi7VLlr5cLNXASdvA/viewform" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">submissions</a> for project ideas. </p>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">Jonah Cool and Eric Kauderer-Abrams, who lead partnerships and R&D for Life Sciences at Anthropic, respectively, discuss this and other recent work below.</p>
                        <div class="Body_media-column__xPzhg">
                            <figure class="Video_post-wrapper__uy5Rq">
                                <div class="Video_post-video-container__oACj_">
                                    <!--$!--><template data-dgst="BAILOUT_TO_CLIENT_SIDE_RENDERING"></template><!--/$-->
                                </div>
                                <figcaption class="text-caption">Anthropic’s Jonah Cool and Eric Kauderer-Abrams share their vision for making Claude the go-to AI research assistant for scientists with Claude for Life Sciences.</figcaption>
                            </figure>
                        </div>
                        <h2 class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM display-sans-m post-heading" id="getting-started">Getting started</h2>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text">To learn more about Claude for Life Sciences or set up a demo with our team, see <a href="https://claude.com/contact-sales/life-sciences" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">here</a>.</p>
                        <p class="Body_reading-column__t7kGM paragraph-m post-text"><a href="https://www.claude.com/solutions/life-sciences" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Claude for Life Sciences</a> is available through Claude.com and on the AWS Marketplace, with Google Cloud Marketplace availability coming soon.</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </article>
        </div>
